info.name: Next Torrent
info.summary: Easy to use torrent app for Nextcloud.
info.description: Easy to use torrent app for Nextcloud. It is capable of selecting default downloading folder and also set a specific folder for specific torrent and it will also let user to chose which files from torrent download. Also it will be possible to let the files seed. It is in future. :-)
